susy 3.0.0-alpha.6

[Plugin] SVG Grid Image

susy-svg-grid() function

Return inline svg-data in to display the grid (import plugins/svg-grid/prefix to remove unprefixed alias)

@function susy-svg-grid(
  $grid: $susy,
  $colors: null,
  $offset: null
) { /* ... */ }
Parameters
namedescriptiontypedefault
$grid

Map or shorthand defining the current grid

Map | List$susy
$colors

Column color, or list of colors for column-gradient, used to override the global svg-grid-colors setting

Color | List | nullnull
$offset

Manually override the default grid-image offset, to account for grid edges

Length | nullnull
Requires
  • [function] susy-compile
  • [function] susy-get
  • [function] _susy-svg-gradient
  • [function] _susy-svg-color
  • [function] _susy-svg-offset
  • [function] susy-span
  • [function] _susy-svg-column-position
  • [function] _susy-svg-rect

svg-grid() function

Un-prefixed alias for susy-svg-grid

@function svg-grid { /* ... */ }
Requires
  • [function] susy-svg-grid

$susy-defaults variable

This plugin adds the svg-grid-colors property and default value to $susy-defaults â€” you can override that value in $susy or any other grid settings map.

$susy-defaults: map-merge((
    'svg-grid-colors': hsla(120, 50%, 50%, 0.5) hsla(120, 50%, 75%, 0.5),
  ), $susy-defaults);
